name: Pizzas, Please
description:
Pizzas, Please

Stoke the oven!  Assemble the pizza!  Bake that pie, but don't burn it!  Get that baby in a box and out the door, with Pizzas, Please!  Aaaaand, repeat!  Maybe even go for a stroll down the beach.  Things might get crazy!

ARROW KEYS / WASD to MOVE

SPACEBAR / ENTER to INTERACT

My first solo dev game jam entry for Godot Wild Jam #53

Proudly made with Godot Engine, Aseprite, and a fair amount of caffeine over a 9 day timespan.

Entire game created between January 13th 2023 at 4:00 PM and January 22nd 2023.  Holy cow I need sleep.
